title: someone please play some norm games with me.
body:
every time im practicing a champion and i actually do good and get fed with them in lane the rest of my team comes along and ruins the whole experience for me. And if i happen to do bad on that champion both my team and the enemy team flames me to the point where i want to afk. 
 Im losing so many games right now its not even funny. All of the people i usually play with arent online and its really stressing me out having to try to fight through this big ass losing spree alone. i just need someone good to play with, i feel a lot better in games when im duoing with someone.
